text: Tamam kay tamam chalney phirney walay jaandaaron ko Allah Taalaa hi ney pani say peda kiya hai inn mein say baaz to apnay pet kay bal chaltay hain baaz do paon per chaltay hain. Baaz char paon per chaltay hain Allah Taalaa jo chahata hai peda kerta hai. Be-shak Allah Taalaa her cheez per qadir hai
